decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - Commencement of development (Full Permission) - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - Approved Plans - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:Drawing no. EXT-100/Rev 00 (SITE LOCATION PLAN) Dated 26 June 2023.
Drawing no. PRP-1000/Rev00 (Existing Ground Floor Plan) Dated 26.06.2023.
Drawing no. PRP-1001/Rev00 (Proposed First Floor Plan) Dated26.06.2023. 
Drawing no: PRP-1002/Rev00 (Proposed Second Floor Plan) Dated 26.06.2023.
Drawing no. PRP-1003/Rev00 (Proposed Third Floor Plan) Dated 26.06.2023. 
Drawing no. PRP-2000/Rev00 (Proposed Section AA Plan) Dated 26.06.2023.
Drawing no. PRP-3000/Rev00 (Proposed Front Elevation Plan (1)) Dated 26.06.2023. 
Drawing no. PRP-3001/Rev00 (Proposed Side Elevation Plan (2) Dated 26.06.2023. 
Drawing no. PRP-3002/Rev00(Proposed Side Elevation Plan (3) Dated 26.06.2023.
Drawing no. PRP-3003/Rev00 (Proposed Rear Elevation (4) Dated26.06.2023

Condition : 3 - Materials as Specified - The facing materials to be used for the development hereby permitted shall be those specified in the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:

   i) Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
   ii) Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
   iii) As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.

In this instance:

   i) The application was acceptable as submitted and no further assistance was required.
  ii) The application was approved without delay.
description: CONVERSION OF EXISTING INTERNAL GARAGE INTO HABITABLE ROOM. REMOVAL OF EXISTING FOLDING GARAGE DOOR, AND REPLACEMENT WITH GLAZED ENTRANCE DOORS.
